title: Melf's First Staff
content:
k rolls. Melf's Acid Arrow: Once per Long Rest, shoot a green arrow that covers the target and the ground with acid. Deals 4d4 Acid damage immediately and 2d4 Acid damage at the end of the target's turn. Rarity: Uncommon Value: 100 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg.

BG3 Melf's First Staff Location & Where to Find

Location: Underdark Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Sold by Blurg in the Myconid Colony.
